title: Clash times for Non-East Coast states
body:
Hi Riot OCE,

As a proposition for starting Clash in the future, is it possible to push ahead the start time by 30mins - 1 hour? A 7pm AEST start time means that people like myself in Western Australia are struggling to get home from work for a 5:30pm end of lock-in period. If that was even pushed back by a little bit I'm sure it would help people from WA and SA to be able to participate in Clash.

Thanks for the consideration!
